thread.title: Review: Michael Savage Outlines His Strategic Plan for Victory in ‘Trump’s War’
thread.title_full: Review: Michael Savage Outlines His Strategic Plan for Victory in ‘Trump’s War’

author: Colin Madine
title: Review: Michael Savage Outlines His Strategic Plan for Victory in ‘Trump’s War’
text: It would have been easy for Michael Savage to write a book about the election of Donald Trump that boils down to “I told you so.” After all, Savage was one of Trump’s earliest supporters. But instead of taking the easy route, Savage has written Trump's War: His Battle for America, a comprehensive battle plan for the Trump administration ranging from his familiar topics of “borders, language, and culture,” to economics and the deep state.
